snippet.title: Banjo-Kazooie Returns - (Full Custom Mod) Trailer #9
snippet.description:
Follow on Twitch for livestreams every Wednesday: https://www.twitch.tv/superzambezi

The latest trailer for Banjo-Kazooie Returns, a fan-made BK project I've been working on for the last seven years. I only work on the mod once a week and you can watch my progress live each Wednesday on Twitch channel. 

This trailer showcases the levels worked on in the last year. A good amount of progress! :) Other places to check out:

BKR Discord: https://discord.gg/pAfbjB2
My Twitter: https://twitter.com/SuperZambezi

Music in this trailer was created by Badub, make sure to check out his other custom BK music here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ZdpOhL2oFU

-----

Some frequently asked questions:

Q: When will this be released?
A: I work on this at my own pace. At the rate I'm going, I wouldn't expect it to be done for at least another year or two.

Q: Can you release a demo?
A: I did! You can play through a small portion of the hub and the main area of World 1. Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1T61vu6l5mI

Q: How many worlds will there be?
A: The goal is to replace all nine of the original worlds. No more, no less.

Q: Can you create new enemies and bosses? New moves?
A: The simple answer is no, I have to stick with what is already available in vanilla Banjo-Kazooie. That kind of functionality doesn't exist yet in the BK modding scene.

Q: Why aren't you modding Banjo Tooie? Can you include collectibles and moves from BT?
A: Sadly, no as well. We don't have tools to make that happen and it certainly isn't as simple as moving something from one game to the next. Banjo-Kazooie is used as the base game because it is the most moddable, plus I personally prefer its simplicity in collectibles and puzzle depth when compared to Banjo Tooie.

Q: Can I help with music?
A: I work on this project alone, but I will need someone to help with music in the future. BUT, I'd like to look for help in the music department when I'm comfortable with the amount of work I have done. Please don't contact me just yet, I'm not ready to start looking!

Q: Will this run on the original Nintendo 64?
A: Hopefully! But this is not my goal so I will not be optimizing the game to run on the original hardware.
